        public static SipUri.ParsedSipContactInfos parseSipContact(String sipUri)
        Parse a sip contact
        Parameters:
        sipUri - string sip contact
        Returns:
        a ParsedSipContactInfos which contains uri parts. If not match return the object with blank fields

      • getDisplayedSimpleContact

        public static String getDisplayedSimpleContact(CharSequence uri)
        Return what should be display as caller id for this sip uri This is the merged and fancy way fallback to uri or user name if needed
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • getCanonicalSipContact

        public static String getCanonicalSipContact(String sipContact)
        Transform sip uri into something that doesn't depend on remote display name For example, if you give "Display Name" It will return sip:user@domain.com
        Parameters:
        sipContact - full sip uri
        Returns:
        simplified sip uri

      • getCanonicalSipContact

        public static String getCanonicalSipContact(String sipContact,
                            boolean includeScheme)
        Transform sip uri into something that doesn't depend on remote display name
        Parameters:
        sipContact - full sip uri
        includeScheme - whether to include scheme
        Returns:
        the canonical sip contact
        Example sip:user@domain.com
        or user@domain.com (if include scheme is false)

        Returns:
